xmlText.p: First Period_1, Arizona, Demers 4 (Stepan, Keller), 3:53. 2, Philadelphia, Giroux 17 (Gostisbehere, Voracek), 10:19 (pp). 3, Philadelphia, Raffl 10 (Weal, Laughton), 11:41. Penalties_Weal, PHI, (slashing), 7:05; Panik, ARI, (holding), 7:21; Arizona bench, served by Fischer (too many men on the ice), 10:04; Hjalmarsson, ARI, (slashing), 15:00.

Second Period_4, Arizona, Goligoski 6 (Fischer, Hjalmarsson), 0:24. 5, Philadelphia, Simmonds 19 (Gostisbehere, Couturier), 2:12 (pp). Penalties_Stepan, ARI, (hooking), 1:18; Weise, PHI, (interference), 11:36.
Third Period_6, Arizona, Rinaldo 4 (Domi), 1:59. Penalties_Voracek, PHI, (cross checking), 9:38; Martinook, ARI, (roughing), 9:38.
Shootout_Philadelphia 2 (Weal NG, , Konecny NG, Voracek G, Giroux NG, Couturier NG, Raffl NG, Patrick G), Arizona 1 (Cousins G, Keller NG, Perlini NG, Stepan NG, Rieder NG, Hjalmarsson NG, Domi NG).
Goalies_Philadelphia, Elliott 21-11-7 (27 shots-24 saves). Arizona, Raanta 9-14-6 (43-40).
Referees_Tom Chmielewski, Brad Watson. Linesmen_Shandor Alphonso, Kiel Murchison.
